snippet: Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel met with the Qatari emir, Sheikh Tamim bin Hamad, and Defense Minister Hamad bin Ali al-Attiyah on the last day of a visit to the region to reassure gulf Arab allies of continuing United States support.
abstract: Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel meets with Qatari emir Sheikh Tamim bin Hamad and Defense Min Hamad bin Ali al-Attiyah on the last day of his visit to the region; Hagel's visit is intended to reassure gulf Arab allies of continuing United States support despite disagreements over policy toward Syria and Iran.
lead_paragraph: Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel met with the Qatari emir, Sheikh Tamim bin Hamad, and Defense Minister Hamad bin Ali al-Attiyah on the last day of a visit to the region to reassure gulf Arab allies of continuing United States support.

headline.main: Qatar Signs Defense Accord With U.S.
headline.print_headline: Qatar Signs Defense Accord With U.S.
